testcase.name: createStudentTest

failure.message: org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Only void methods can doNothing()! Example of correct use of doNothing(): doNothing(). doThrow(new RuntimeException()) .when(mock).someVoidMethod(); Above means: someVoidMethod() does nothing the 1st time but throws an exception the 2nd time is called
